overlay.title: Seismic map
overlay.content:
This map shows the seismic events registered by the European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre (EMSC).

The map displays the seismic activity of the last six hours. You can use the timeline placed at the bottom of the page to navigate in time, selecting older earthquakes.

The application can be paused in order to avoid notifications about new earthquakes.
To read the details about a single event, you can click on it on the map or in the sidebar.
